price: The decree [of punishment] will befall them because of their wrongdoing, leaving them speechless.
arabic: وَوَقَعَ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَيۡهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يَنطِقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
